ComicInfo.Summary:
Could Wasteland's location be in the DC Universe? Discover an answer in the "Big Crossover Story" with cameos from some unexpected guests! Stories by John Ostrander, Del Close, David Lloyd, William Messner-Loebs and Donald Simpson. *Cover to Cover * Originally Cover for Issue #6, but contains issue #5 material. There was a misprint to copies of issue #5, where the cover for issue #6 is printed instead of the proper cover. Make Sure that the contents in the Silver Woman cover is really issue #6.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/wasteland-5-this-time-we-win-under-the-lash-big-cr/4000-47656/

ComicInfo.Title: This Time We Win!; Under the Lash; Big Crossover Issue
ComicInfo.Letterer: Don Simpson,William Messner-Loebs,Steve Craddock,Don Simpson,William Messner-Loebs,Steve Craddock
